title: Ticket #1535: Schedd SOAP crash
description:
User is submitting jobs using CycleServer. CycleServer is having a problem of some sort, so the jobs never succeed. CycleServer retries the submission repeatedly. After about two minutes, the user sees the schedd crash.

The crash happens deep inside libc, mostly in malloc/alloc, suggesting that we have corrupted memory elsewhere.

Debugging is ongoing on the RUST ticket.
remarks:
